email = 'emas88+testing@mekar.id', password = 'Testing1', negative_test = True

    @allure.title("Skenario Sign Agreement [negatif]")
    def sign_agreement_negative_1(email, password, negative_test=False):
        start_time = time.time()
        browser = None
        try:
            with allure.step(f"Sign Agreement with email: {email}"):
                service = Service(ChromeDriverManager().install(), log_path=os.devnull, service_args=["--disable-logging"])
                browser = webdriver.Chrome(service=service)
                # browser = webdriver.Chrome(ChromeDriverManager().install())
                browser.get("https://mekar-test.xyz/dashboard/")
                browser.maximize_window()
                time.sleep(1)
    
    
            with allure.step("Mengisi Email"):
                email_input = browser.find_element(By.XPATH, "//input[@id='login_email']")
                slow_typing(email_input, email)
    
            with allure.step("Mengisi Password"):
                password_input = browser.find_element(By.XPATH, "//input[@id='login_password']")
                slow_typing(password_input, password)
                allure.attach(browser.get_screenshot_as_png(), name="Fill in Password")
    
            with allure.step("Klik Tombol Login"):
                login_button = browser.find_element(By.XPATH, "//body/div[@id='root']/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/form[1]/div[5]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/button[1]")
                login_button.click()
    
                wait = WebDriverWait(browser, 20)
                try:
                    wait.until(EC.invisibility_of_element_located((By.XPATH, "//body/div[@id='root']/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/form[1]/div[5]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/button[1]")))
                except TimeoutException:
                    allure.attach(browser.get_screenshot_as_png(), name="Login Button Not Disappeared")
                    raise TimeoutException("Login button did not disappear")
                allure.attach(browser.get_screenshot_as_png(), name="Popup Not Found")
    
                try:
                    popup = browser.find_element(By.CLASS_NAME, "modal.multi-step.custom-modal.use-of-information")
                    if popup.is_displayed():
                        with allure.step("Check Popup Tanda Tangan Perjanjian"):
                            agree_button = popup.find_element(By.XPATH, "//button[contains(text(),'Agree')]")
                            agree_button.click()
                            time.sleep(5)
                except NoSuchElementException:
                    pass
    
                # Check if Unexpected Element Appears
                try:
                    unexpected_element = browser.find_element(By.XPATH, "//*[@id='myModal']/div/div/div/button")
                    if unexpected_element.is_displayed():
>                       raise Exception("Unexpected Element Found")
E                       Exception: Unexpected Element Found

Lender-Subscription-FP.py:217: Exception
